questions.quote: Well, also, Jerry, we read an article in the Sun Sentinel.  It says standup comedy is not what it used to be, what with def jam and all.
Hey!! Buddy. I thought of a great invention for driving. A periscope in a car, so you can see the traffic.
I'll tell you what's wrong, a grown woman with a male roommate!Â  It's unnatural, it's an abomination!
Look, I need the keys to your apartment, I gotta take a shower.
How can I do this? How can I move back in with those people? Please, tell me. They're insane. You know that.
Please give it to me. I love to help people. This is what I do. Come on. I'm going this way.
Oh!!.....Joseph Aboud .. and look at this hand ticking around the crest.
Well, Elaine, has nothing but Good things to say about Susie.
But it takes forty-five minutes to get there. That'll only leave me five minutes to get to the plane.
George and Elaine went to a flea market in Westchester, okay?!
